Class NGramLanguageModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • opennlp.tools.ngram.NGramModel
      • opennlp.tools.languagemodel.NGramLanguageModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<StringList>, LanguageModel

    public class NGramLanguageModel
extends NGramModel
implements LanguageModel
    AÂ LanguageModel based on a NGramModel using Stupid Backoff to get the probabilities of the ngrams.
